about.current_status: Undergraduate BE Computer Engineering @Dwarkadas J. Sanghvi College of Engineering
about.contact_message: Have a project for me? Think I'd be a good fit for your team? I'd love to hear from you, reach me out through my email.
about.description: I am an athlete at heart, with an entrepreneurial spirit and always up for learning new things. Being able to adjust to situations makes me a very flexible asset to anyone who hires me and to my collegues. My passion lies in creating and developing new things which includes WebApps, Embedded Systems and applying Machine/Deep learning models in various projects. My research interest lies in Scene Perception and Cognitive tasks of Natural Language Processing. Apart from a techie, I am also a photographer(Long-exposures being my favourite). I'll add the gallery soon.

education.name: DWARKADAS J. SANGHVI COLLEGE OF ENGINEERING
ST. Rocks College Of Science and Commerce
education.score: Finals: 89.4% , JEE mains :22000 rank, JEE Advanced :7500 rank.

work.title: Research and Development Intern
work.description: My work at Phionike at first involved laying down the foundation of Research & Development of AI department in the company. During my time there I did a research in the VUI(Voice user interface) sector and what impact does it have on the various sections of the society. I basically researched about how a VUI system works and to do that I studied how the famous Amazon's Alexa works. I also built a skill which fetches blogs and reads them out for you. Other than VUI systems, there were several research ideas that the company had in store to work on, my job on them were to create proper documentations for future references.

work.title: Professional Photographer
work.description: peAR Technologies is an AR / VR tech based Start-up in Mumbai. Their first product peAR-1 shows how the food on menu will look like on the table of your restaurant. I Worked here as a photographer. My job was to provide them with images of food dishes from various angles so that they can render those images and build a 3D model (Virtual/Augmented Reality). Brings your food to life.

projects.title: Face Detection
projects.description: In this project my aim was to build a python script that is able to detect faces. I used Haar Cascades to detect frontal faces. My next goal was to train a neural network that can distinguish my various faces. With that in mind I asked my friends to help my out by providing images of their faces (preferably frontal faces). I created 3 classes, one containing my face. The end product of the project was a 90% accurate model that can distinguish between various faces.

projects.title: Emotion Recognizer
projects.description: I made an emotion recognizer that scans the frontal face using Haar Cascade and then uses the faces detected to look for what emotion class does it belong to. The detection is fast enough to be run at ~30fps.

projects.title: American Sign Language Detection
projects.description: The main goal of the project was to develop a model that was able to detect various signs used by the mute people to communicate with people who do not know how to interpret it. Hence I thought of developing a model that can be integrated in the mobile app and can help the user to decipher what the other person is trying to say without the help of a translator. The end goal was to integrate the ability to use optical flow analysis and be able to convert the signs into Natural Language and give an audio output but due to the lack of computation resources we could not complete the entire project.

projects.title: Age Of Warring Empire tower bot
projects.description: The tower of age of warring empire game has 10 levels and spawns a random map every time, I found this very boring as I had to complete these levels nearly 50 times to level up my heroes from 1-120-ish level and the max level of heroes were 400, that means 50*10 = 500 times. My solution was this, using OpenCV and template matching, I designed bot that on given certain restrictions, it will utilize gold coins or energy cards accordingly and automate the attacking process. This reduced my efforts as I don't have to play and my heroes get levelled up to 400 in a matter of few hours. Another use case that I developed is the Hydra bot, a Hydra event in the game has 1000 levels, each having 10 sub levels thus, resulting in 10000 attacks, I applied some similar strategies but with deadlock conditions and now I can clear approximately 800 levels in a matter of 6 hours.

projects.title: Smart India Hackathon - Attention Span detection and detailed analysis of Dialogue.
projects.description: This project was built in the qualification round fron the college, so that we can send our proposals to the SIH committee. The project goal was to create system for online lectures that will help the teacher in improving their lectures and provide the students with more engaging content. The project leverages the power of high speed of WebRTC and AioRTC in Python to provide real time analysis for the realtime streaming and processing the video feed. While processing the video feed we analyze the video and audio to extract features such as how long was the attention span of the student and when the student was the most attentive and the least attentive. For the Audio part, we provided detailed analysis of what percentage of the online lecture was one way (Teacher to Student) or two way (both Teacher to Student and Student to Teacher).

projects.title: E - Yantra Competition (Theme - Nutty Squirrel)
projects.description: e - Yantra Robotics competition: I was the team leader and we built a line following, color sensing bot with picking and releasing mechanism using Atmega2560 which traversed the arena using Djikstra's algorithm. We ended up being the runner ups of the competition.

projects.title: Garduino - Smart Garden
projects.description: My final year BE project. This project uses IoT to smartly take care of the plants as well as provide Information on the plants who wants to know about them. Main features include Realtime sensor updates, Live Video feed of the garden, Plant Disease detection through OpenCV. It is a React based web app that leverages the power of cloud computing to keep the production code managable.

projects.title: Stack Overflow Chatbot
projects.description: This was the end project for the HSE NLP course on Coursera. I was tasked to build a chatbot which was able to understand the users input and classify the intent and then based on the question, give appropriate responses. The bot was made to be run on Telegram and hosted on an online instance such as AWS. Currently it is not hosted anywhere ans is available for use and training on Github.

projects.title: Twitter Named Entity Recognition
projects.description: This was one of project for the HSE NLP course on Coursera. I was tasked to build a named entity recognition model that will extract the various entities present in the tweet. I used Bi-Directional LSTM's and have also tested the same by using GRU's in place of LSTM's. It was a fun project where I learned the underlying mechanisms of how to recognize things in a text.

projects.title: Library Attendance Manager
projects.description: This project was built for attendance management for the college library. It uses a Barcode scanner to scan the ID of the students and the teachers and logs this information into a password protected database. College required a secure storage of the records of who enters or leaves the Library therefore requested Me and my other friend to create such a system.

projects.title: DJ Archive
projects.description: A live project that is being used by the college to maintain and keep record of the award winning projects, projects done under faculties and final year projects. I worked as a Backend Developer in this project. When some changes were requested by the faculties, I was appointed as the Project Lead to guide a team of 4 Juniors who integrated the extended feature requirements.

projects.title: College - Event Manager App
projects.description: This project was built to facilitate the teachers in generating the reports of any event held in the college. The system allows for a very simple drag and drop functionality and at the end the report generation saves lot of time of the teachers. I was a part of the backend team in this project and took active part in the designing and planning the database and various APIs.

projects.title: Resume Website
projects.description: This project was aimed at creating my own personal website where I get to showcase my skills and projects.

testimonials.text: His sincere contribution and innovative thinking helped us come up with some great solutions for our project. During his internship period he worked on forming ML division in Phionike and also worked on creating and deploying Amazon Alexa Skill. He is a good team player and a great asset to the team.
testimonials.user: Roopam Mishra, Founder of Phionike Solutions: Design-Tech Studio.

leaderships.title: Full Stack Mentor & Events Head
leaderships.description: I am passionate about the need for knowledge transfer and actively work with a student-run organization - DJ Unicode. It is an initiative to foster a culture of open-source development to students in their early years at college. I mentor students in backend web technologies and guide them in advanced CS subjects such as Machine Learning, Natural Language Processing and Computer Vision. Under Unicode, in my junior year I was the project lead of DJ Archive, and mentored the rest of the students in their projects. Another project that we deveoped was the College Event manager that is being used by the faculties right now in the college. We also conducted workshops for second and first year students where we taught multifarios topics including Python, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Object Oriented Programming and Django so that they can take part in Hackathons. Unicode has grown from 45 developers in its first year to roughly 70 developers currently with many deployed and ongoing projects.
